name: Cubathon (Oxsisery)
description:
Race to the end of the levels while dodging grey obstacles, most importantly DON'T hit into the obstacles, and DON'T fall off the edge.

To dodge the upcoming obstacles, press the A and D keys, BUT make sure not to hold  these keys for too long. As you move on through the levels, they get harder and even    harder.

 Conquer Different Levels,

and DON'T fall, or hit anything!!!

The controls are simple

A and D keys to move

Left Click to Interact with UI

The Game's mechanics were made following a YT tutorial by Brackeys.

 Although, I am planning to code, build and create the rest of the game.

Game Engine: Unity. Version: 2023.1.0a4

Tips and Tricks:  [Spoilers]

Always remain focus on the game because obstacles will appear in game.

Don't hold the A and D keys for too long, since it will make the block move faster and, it makes it harder to control. Also, this will make the block have a higher chance of  falling  off the edge or hitting into an obstacle.

Each level has some of the same obstacles as the previous level but with extra obstacles, so remember how you conquered those obstacles in the previous levels and do the same in that level.

If you fail a level, learn from what you did wrong and try again.

Install instructions

1 - Un-zip the file.

2 - Open "Cubathon.exe"

3 - Enjoy...
